text: Lukhumi Chkhvimiani (born 3 May 1993) is a Georgian judoka.European Games profile He won the gold medal at the 2019 World Judo Championships.2019 World Judo Championships –60 kg results ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Male judoka from Georgia (country) Category:World judo champions Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Judoka at the 2019 European Games Category:European Games competitors for Georgia (country) Category:European Games medalists in judo Category:European Games gold medalists for Georgia (country)
title: Lukhumi Chkhvimiani
